name: Cave (JRBeryllium)
description:
A very small procedural platformer about picking up and throwing pots to gain score while avoiding enemies.

While the game can be played in the browser, the downloadable games contain a better experience.

This was a personal project in which I learnt how to use the Godot engine to create a game. In the process, I also learnt pixel art, animation, music creation, and various other tools.

Controls:

  • WASD to move/jump
  • Shift to run
  • Esc to pause
  • Right-click to pick up pots
  • Left-click to throw pots
  • Space to go through doors

Credits:

Programming, Art, Animation, Music by Jason Webster (JRBeryllium)
